system.descriptionText: An inbuilt failsafe device. If the wearer dies, their Battlesuit Explodes, their body and the Battlesuit are destroyed, inflicting 3d10+10 Energy Damage to all Targets within 20 metres. The wearer can intentionally activate the device if they are alive by passing a -20 Willpower Test, in doing so also suffer the Damage that ignores their armour.
